description: Kuruma Chidori is a C-Genomer from Tochigi Prefecture, a cheerful high-school girl who looks and acts child-like until she transforms into a tennyo. Chidori cares deeply for her younger brother, Shouta, who was hospitalized upon her introduction into the story. She can transform into a tennyo at will. She develops deepening feelings for her crush Yuuhi and later dies for his sake. The Mikage scientists identify Chidori`s tennyo type as Pallas.
name: Kuruma Chidori
